Name: potassium nitrate production | potassium nitrate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds
Description: This datasets corresponds to the technology used in Chinese fertiliser plants. The production of potassium nitrate involves potassium chloride and nitric acid using heat.
